sections.title: Variants
sections.content: Use the variant prop to change the visual style of the button.

sections.title: Colors
sections.content: Use standard Tailwind color names with the color prop to control the color of the primary button.
examples: <flux:button variant="primary" color="zinc">Zinc</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="red">Red</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="orange">Orange</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="amber">Amber</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="yellow">Yellow</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="lime">Lime</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="green">Green</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="emerald">Emerald</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="teal">Teal</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="cyan">Cyan</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="sky">Sky</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="blue">Blue</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="indigo">Indigo</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="violet">Violet</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="purple">Purple</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="fuchsia">Fuchsia</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="pink">Pink</flux:button><flux:button variant="primary" color="rose">Rose</flux:button>

sections.title: Sizes
sections.content: The default button size works great for most cases, but here are some additional size options for unique situations.

sections.title: Icons
sections.content: Automatically sized and styled icons for your buttons.

sections.title: Loading
sections.content:
Buttons with wire:click or type="submit" will automatically show a loading indicator and disable pointer events during network requests.
You can disable this behavior using :loading="false".

sections.title: Full width
sections.content: A button that spans the full width of the container.

sections.title: Button groups
sections.content: Fuse related buttons into a group with shared borders.

sections.title: Icon group
sections.content: Fuse multiple icon buttons into a visually-linked group.

sections.title: Attached button
sections.content: Append or prepend an icon button to another button to add additional functionality.

sections.title: As a link
sections.content: Display an HTML a tag as a button by passing the href prop.

sections.title: As an input
sections.content: To display a button as an input, pass as="button" to the input component.

sections.title: Square
sections.content: Make the height and width of a button equal. Flux does this automatically for icon-only buttons.

sections.title: Inset
sections.content: When using ghost or subtle button variants, you can use the inset prop to negate any invisible padding for better alignment.
